name: Potion Shop
description:
Use the < ^ v > Arrow keys and mouse to interact with the environment.

Each level is a different track from A Hutchie's Potion Shop.

Game created by eccina

Music Produced and arranged by Aaron Hutchinson

Aaron Hutchinson: synthesizers, trumpet, piano, drum programming, percussion, vocals.

With: Connor Bennett: saxophone (2, 3, 5, 6, 7) ; Jason Bhattacharya: vocals (5), guitar (3, 5), drum kit (5, 7); Blankie: vocals and harmony (1); Marc Blouin: clarinet (1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 8); Allie Blumas: flute (4); Dan Edmonds: bass (5); Emay: vocals (3); Miles Evans Branaugh: clavinet (5, 6), rhodes (7); Chris Ferguson: saxophone (3); Sarah Good: vocals/ harmony (2); Evelyn Charlotte Joe: synthesizer (6), vocals (6), guitar (6), bass (2, 7); Ian Keteku: vocals/ harmony (7); Graeme Moffatt: bass (1, 3, 6, 8); Courtney Prizrenac: french horn (1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 8); Kirk Starkey: cello (5); Jen Stephen: tuba (1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8); Sara Traficante: flute (1, 2, 3, 6, 7, 8); Trevor Turple: guitars, bass, vocals/ harmony (4); Benita Whyte: vocals (6)
Mixed by Aaron Hutchinson, Mastered by Nik Kozub,
